ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT($Setup.loan__Org_Parameters__c.loan__Integrate_Salesforce_CRM__c) ,OR( ( NOT(ISBLANK(loan__Guarantor__c )) && NOT(ISBLANK(loan__Client__c )) && loan__Guarantor__c = loan__Client__c ), (NOT(ISBLANK(loan__Guarantor__c )) && NOT(ISBLANK(loan__Co_Applicant__c )) && loan__Guarantor__c = loan__Co_Applicant__c ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Guarantor can not be same as Client or Co-applicant.
